1.0.name: wordpress/simple-twitter-status-updates
1.0.description:
The "Simple Twitter Status Updates" WordPress plugin automatically publishes a status on your twitter account when a post has been published, modified or commented by a user.

The "Simple Twitter Status Updates" plugin is configured in with just a few easy clicks and gets connected to your twitter account using oAuth. That means: you dont need to give away your twitter password!

Keep your followers up-to-date with what happens on your blog!

Features

  • Automatic twitter status updates from your blog
  • Twitter authentication using oAuth (don't give away your twitter account password)
  • Prefix and suffix for every status update
  • Automatic URL shortening using bit.ly
  • Event log (see what the plugin is doing)

Requirements

  • WordPress 3.0 or higher
  • PHP 5.2 or higher
  • PHP extension CURL version 7.0 or higher
  • PHP save mode must be turned OFF
  • The
